explains: adj. 令人振奋的；使人开心的

sentences.en: Such measures have a couple of uplifting motives.
sentences.cn: 这些措施有一些令人振奋的动机。

sentences.en: Articles were to be short, readable and uplifting.
sentences.cn: 文章必须短小精悍，可读性强，且令人振奋。

sentences.en: Willpower is most dynamic when applied to positive, uplifting purposes.
sentences.cn: 意志力在用于积极向上的目标时是最具活力的。
